CSSMatrixComponent.summary: The CSSMatrixComponent interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the {{cssxref("transform-function/matrix", "matrix()")}} and {{cssxref("transform-function/matrix3d", "matrix3d()")}} values of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSMatrixComponentCSSMatrixComponent.summary:
The CSSMatrixComponent() constructor
creates a new object representing the {{cssxref("transform-function/matrix", "matrix()")}} and {{cssxref("transform-function/matrix3d", "matrix3d()")}} values of the
individual 'transform' property in CSS.

CSSMatrixComponentMatrix.summary:
The matrix property of the
interface gets and sets a 2d or 3d matrix.

remarks.para:
See the transform-function/matrix and transform-function/matrix3d pages for
examples.
